member.name: T:WCSharp.Effects.EffectSystem
member.summary:
Simple system for destroying effects after a given duration.
This circumvents issues with certain special effects not showing up if deleted immediately in Reforged.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Effects.EffectSystem.Add(War3Api.Common.effect,System.Single)
member.summary: Adds an effect for removal after the given duration.
